alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 5:35PM CST until December 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DONIPHAN...EASTERN ATCHISON...BUCHANAN... NORTHWESTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHERN ANDREW COUNTIES... At 535 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Union Star, or 13 miles northeast of Savannah, moving northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Agency, Dearborn, Amazonia, Rushville, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, Easton, De Kalb, Cosby, Iatan, St. Joseph Airport, Faucett, Bean Lake and Lewis And Clark Vi. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 28 and 61. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
